sites.name: All sites

sites.compiledCss: .blob-wrapper, .blob-num, .blob-code, code {font-weight: 200!important; font-family: "Jetbrains Mono" !important;}body, .markdown-body {font-family: "Titillium Web" !important;}h1, h2, h3, h4, h5, h6, b, strong, .text-bold {font-weight: 700!important;}
body, table, tr, td, span, a, .title, .commtext, .hnuser, .age, .subtext, .athing, .pagetop, .hnname {font-family: "Titillium Web" !important;}.title {font-weight: 600 !important;}
sites.css:
body, table, tr, td, span, a, .title, .commtext, .hnuser, .age, .subtext, .athing, .pagetop, .hnname {font-family: "Titillium Web" !important;}

.title {font-weight: 600!important;}
